name: AVENdGE ME
description:
Made for Global Game Jam 2022: Duality
with the Portland Indie Game Squad

This is a game about eating mystery snacks from an alien vending machine until you finally attain the elusive sweet-salty balance... or your break ends and you gotta go back to work.

It can be solved through deductive reasoning! Look carefully at the things you're eating. (Which effects belong to which traits are randomly determined each time.)

Controls: mouse

Credits:
Voice 1: Isaac Goodfellow
Voice 2: Itzel
Music and Sound:Peter Karman

Installation notes:
If you Install Love2D, you can download and play the .love file on Windows, Mac, or Linux!
Don't wanna?
* If you have Windows, download the executable marked "Windows," unzip, and double-click the .exe.
* If you have a Mac, download the executable marked "MacOS" and... look, I don't know how your stuff works. Do the thing. Let me know if this doesn't work and I'll try and fix it?
